from controllers.auth import Auth from helpers.clear_console import clear_console

auth = Auth()

def home():
while True:
print(‘’’

1 - Register 2 - Log In 3 - Exit ‘’’)

option = input(“Select OPTION: “)

try:
if option == “1”:

clear_console() print(‘’’

COMPLETE TO REGISTER:

‘’’)

Username = input(“Username: “) Email = input(“Email: “) Password = input(“Password: “) Account = 0

clear_console() auth.register(Username, Email, Password, Account)

if option == “2”:

clear_console() print(‘’’

COMPLETE TO LOGIN: ‘’’)

Password = input(“Password: “)

clear_console() auth.log_in(Password)

if option == “3”:

clear_console() print(“””

Thank you for using MACH BANKING APP “””)

break

except Exception as e:

print(e)
